name: Erupt
description:
This game was developed within 2 months as contribution to the Game Jam "4th Wall Broken - Game Jam 2023".

Content: Your character has to  accomplish some tasks while trying to please the Spirit of Earth and Fire. Will you manage to do that?

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement
  • E: Interaction
  • Q: Show/Hide Quest Window
  • M: Show/Hide Mini Map
